import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-landing', standalone: true, templateUrl: './landing.component.html', styleUrls: ['./landing.component.scss'] }) export class LandingComponent { title = 'Welcome to Vedic Web'; }

Features

Angular 17

Bootstrap 5

Containerized application ready for deployment with Docker Compose.
